descriptionHtml:
FORGET THIS MOD!!   go check out Legend of Zelda Gold to Rupees by CaptKaelus
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23982



Renames gold to rupee for those of you who are using a rupee gold replacer or a zelda mod.
i made this for my personal use but thought i would upload it in case anyone else wanted to use it.
You will of course need to first download a coin replacer for this to make any sense.



I use this with Zelda Rupee Coins by LoganZezima so thanks to him for his awesome mod and as far as i can tell his future plans will make this obsolite, but until then have fun

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3083 thats as close to a link to his mod that i know how to post
author: stijmunkey
